price: 26. Loba: Boyebi bwa yango ezali nde epai ya Allah, ya soló nazali mokebisi ya polele.
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّمَا ٱلۡعِلۡمُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَإِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qul innamā al-ʿil'mu ʿinda al-lahi wa-innamā anā nadhīrun mubīnun
